content: Mhm! Well, if this is the way Captain Mo brewed it, he must have h-his reasons! <style=SizeSmall>But the color does look a little... off...</style>
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Thank you all! I'm so pleased you enjoyed the tea. Ahem, now then, I wonder... what are you hoping to get out of <style=Highlight>nurturing a planet</style>?
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, you're back! Let me have a look at the fruit you've gathered...
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: <style=Highlight>Plums</style>! Sweet, tangy, juicy, and perfect for cooling off. <style=SizeSmall>The sourness nearly knocked my teeth out, hoho.</style>
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Who wants the first sip?
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: I'll go first!
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: What're you scared of?! Let's do it together! Three, two, one! *gulp*...
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Hoho! This is the first pot of tea of our fresh start. Enjoy, everyone! Go on, sip away!
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Th-Then we'll join you!
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: With this weird sweet-and-sour thing in it, I didn't expect it...{短暂停} to actually taste good!
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Ahem, this'll make the tea smell amazing. {A挠头}I'm delighted to use such fresh fruit to brew tea for everyone. Now, without further ado...
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Can these colors and fragrances really be created with just fruit and flowers alone...? That's wild!
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Incredible! Sweet and tangy, and... somehow, I can't taste any tea!
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Please, enjoy your tea. And when you're ready, we can begin talking about <style=Highlight>"nurturing a planet."</style> Mo rush. There's always time for a cup of tea.
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: I believe we're all here on this planet for a better life. <style=SizeSmall>Hoho? It seems even this seed has sensed your presence, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>...</style>
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Hoho, I see you all have high hopes. <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, as you can see, your planet is still in its infancy.
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: When we first took part in "nurturing a planet," we didn't know either. In time, as you discover more of this place, you'll come to see the planet you're dreaming of.
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: I can't wait... for our planet to bloom with interstellar routes, threading the cosmos so we can wander anywhere we please!
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Ah, what an honor~! We're truly grateful to be part of your hopes.
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: I'm happy to share in all your hopes.
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: Hoho, I see you have many wishes. I believe that in your time here, you'll surely make those wonderful dreams come true.
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: I'm not sure...
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: I... I want to see trade on our planet thrive, so life gets better and more convenient for everyone. But... how do we make that happen?
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: For it to grow and flourish, you'll need to plant a "seed" here.
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: The seed... hoho! It might just be your vision for the planet itself. So, what kind of planet do you wish to nurture?
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: I've got a whole bunch of things I want to make happen!
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: <style=Highlight>Mangoes</style>! Sweet and fragrant, almost as if there's a ray of sunshine packed into each bite. <style=SizeSmall>I heard you can even keep the pit as a pet?</style>
info: 围炉煮茶-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本

content: I had no idea you could brew tea with that! I never thought it'd...{短暂停} actually taste good!
